formattedAddress: 800 St Nicholas Ave, New York, NY 10031, USA

originalText.text:
I‚Äôm sure everyone has a good experience here but this gas station isn‚Äôt the best gas station I‚Äôve been to. They open up whenever they want to; it tends to get overwhelmingly crowded either by the constant cars that block entries or parked along the way that it becomes a chore to get past‚Ä¶.just to get into the station. This morning (08/12/21) I pulled in just to get gas only to get shoved off by I assume one of the workers. He seem to have an attitude about it that I just chalked it up to a bad morning or the occasional pumps not working (as usual) and just look to find another station.

The point is, while this may seem like the ONLY gas station along the way it‚Äôs not the best one and trust me I‚Äôm sure you can find a much better and less crowded gas station on your route to whatever destination.

Update 7/17/23: yep still not a good place. Cars are still parked so damn close to the station, still crowded, and when I had issues with the car battery at one time; they couldn‚Äôt even help me‚Ä¶.THEY LITERALLY HAVE A SEMI CAR REPARE STATION RIGHT THERE and the person (who barely understood English or just was insulting my intelligence) brushed me off citing they don‚Äôt have a show but you have two  garage‚Äôs where there was a person LITERALLY fixing up a car ü§∑üèæ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è that day!!

To make matters even worse they even had the gall to discriminate me; I paid for gas and the cashier saw me pay and get a receipt so why did a minute later some guy comes out and asked me did I pay!? Are you for real!?

I only go there to get gas (if I can‚Ä¶) but I really suggest to look elsewhere if you can.

originalText.text: Worst bp I ever been. Took 15 mins to load 10 gallons. Slow!!

originalText.text: I had park my car in the gas station couple of time. Tonight I had a bad experience with one staff member he was very disrespectful arguing  with me about how much I usually  have to pay  for leaving  my car for the night. I wont comeback not even for gas because of this person. I feel very disrespected. He said he only have 3 months working  there.
